content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

Trust us, there is no reason baby cashmere sweaters need to cost $1,000. Snuggle up in ours at an affordable price. Our baby cashmere sweater is lightweight and even softer than our other cashmere sweaters. This ultra-fine fibre is taken from the first combing of a baby goat aged 3-12 months during the warmer spring months only when they no longer need the underfleece that protects them from the harsh winter weather. The combing process does not cause any physical or emotional pain to the goats and each coat can supply fibre for only one sweater per year, making this a special piece made to be appreciated and last forever.
Material: ultra-rare, 100% Grade A cashmere; 13.5 micron thickness, 34-36mm fibre length
Weight: 205 grams
Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
This material is certified by OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 which ensures that no hazardous substances are present
Made from GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard)-certified yarn which are free of chemicals, pesticides, fertilizers, and bleaches
Origin: cashmere sourced from Inner Mongolia and knitted in Zhangjiagang, China
Model is 5'7" and wearing a size Small

Hand wash using cold water and neutral soap or baby shampoo. Rinse out without rubbing and lay flat to dry at room temperature, avoiding sunlight. Iron at low temperature, using pressing cloth. Do not bleach. If you prefer to dry clean, please ask for delicate detergent.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: ultra-rare, 100% Grade A cashmere; 13.5 micron thickness, 34-36mm fibre length
  • Weight: 205 grams
  • Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
  • This material is certified by OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 which ensures that no hazardous substances are present
  • Made from GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard)-certified yarn which are free of chemicals, pesticides, fertilizers, and bleaches
  • Origin: cashmere sourced from Inner Mongolia and knitted in Zhangjiagang, China
  • Model is 5'7" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: Trust us, there is no reason baby cashmere sweaters need to cost $1,000. Snuggle up in ours at an affordable price. Our baby cashmere sweater is lightweight and even softer than our other cashmere sweaters. This ultra-fine fibre is taken from the first combing of a baby goat aged 3-12 months during the warmer spring months only when they no longer need the underfleece that protects them from the harsh winter weather. The combing process does not cause any physical or emotional pain to the goats and each coat can supply fibre for only one sweater per year, making this a special piece made to be appreciated and last forever.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."

What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
